subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the origin of the name Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Rajasthan's name originates from the Rajput kingdoms that once ruled the region. In Sanskrit, 'Rajas' means king and 'thana' means territory or land. Combined, they form the term 'Rajasthan', representing the historical kingdoms that were present in the area.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान की नाम, राजपूतों के कानून और कानून के सामान्य कथा
